1.0.3.name: wordpress/javascript-chat-for-wordpress
1.0.3.description: wp_jschat is chat plugin for wordpress based on Javascript/Ajax that can be used in page with shorttags or as a shoutbox. wp_jschat is multichannel and you may add as many chats as you need in your pages. It has been develop to make an exemple of wordpress plugin in a whole french tutorial about developping wordpress plugin
